description: Works as previously approved to no. 113 (PA/19/02013):Restoration of no. 113 which includes the construction of rear dormer, basement excavation, repairs to front and rear elevations, internal works, and addition of an integrated fabric awning
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
Works as previously approved to both properties 113 + 115 (PA/19/01969 + PA/19/02013):

- Restoration of No.113 and alteration of No.115 to accommodate an A1 use with ancillary storage and office space.
- Works will include: Basement excavation and repairs to front and rear elevations of no. 113.
- Construction of rear terrace and replacement of front elevation at No. 115; and construction of rear dormers and replacement of shopfronts.

Works to 115 as per Minor Material Amendment (PA/20/02609)

- Change of window type and arrangement on the front facade dormer at third floor: from sash windows to historically accurate casement windows.
- Addition of a timber sign on a traditionally detailed metal arm: to the front facade central spine wall.
- Addition of an integrated fabric awning: above the south-facing shopfront glazing.
- Addition of a lantern rooflight above the rear ground floor space: to bring natural daylight and ventilation into the deep floor plan.
- Addition of a lightweight conservatory structure to partially enclose the rear terrace at second floor: to improve the usability of this area and entire floorplan on this level.
